definition: to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: It is possible that you inadvertently took an excessive dose of an over-the-counter preparation.
sentences.chinese: 有可能是你把非处方药吃过量了。

sentences.english: The downside is that you won't get a formal diagnosis nor prescription.
sentences.chinese: 不足之处是你无法得到正式的诊断书及处方。

sentences.english: Result Determin the best prescription approach and prepare the samples.
sentences.chinese: 结果确定处方最佳工艺并制备样品。

sentences.english: Prescription drugs represent only about one-tenth of all health care spending in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 处方药仅占美国医疗保健费用的十分之一。

sentences.english: The doctor gave me a prescription for some medicine.
sentences.chinese: 医生给我开了个去抓药的处方。

sentences.english: It’s treated with nonprescription antifungal creams.
sentences.chinese: 可通过涂抹非处方的抗真菌乳膏进行治疗。

sentences.english: People sometimes do have to pay part of the cost of drugs that doctor prescribes.
sentences.chinese: 人们有时须为医生处方付部份费用。

sentences.english: Objective To optimize the prescription and technology of Brucea javanica oil subnanoemulsion injection.
sentences.chinese: 目的确定鸦胆子油亚纳米乳注射液的处方和制备工艺。

sentences.english: Authorities say they discovered prescription steroids in the home of pro wrestler Chris Benoit.
sentences.chinese: 本诺伊特的家中发现了处方类固醇。

sentences.english: Here's my prescription. Please take it to the pharmacy.
sentences.chinese: 这是我开的处方，拿它到药房取药。

sentences.english: I mean to tell you that you are a poor diagnostician.
sentences.chinese: 我只是想告诉你你开的处方并不高明。

sentences.english: Antiperspirants come in a range of strengths, both over-the-counter and prescription.
sentences.chinese: 止汗剂有不同的强度，分为处方的和非处方的两种。

sentences.english: Antiperspirants come in a range of strengths, both over-the-counter and prescription.
sentences.chinese: 止汗剂有不同的强度，分为处方的和非处方的两种。
但是，这个处方是错误的。
沙逊有个与众不同的“处方”。

sentences.english: Ask your provider which nonprescription medicines are safe to use.
sentences.chinese: 询问医护人员，那些非处方的药是可以安心服用的。

definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]
medicine made from a single herb/drug made from a single substance

(TCM) the four methods of diagnosis, namely 望診|望诊[wang4 zhen3] (observation), 聞診|闻诊[wen2 zhen3] (auscultation and olfaction), 問診|问诊[wen4 zhen3] (interrogation), 切診|切诊[qie4 zhen3] (pulse feeling and palpation)
